resources.string: Your name is %1$s!, hiking in a mexico forest, you realize that it is going dark and you see an abandoned cabin, what would you do?
It’s to clean to be abandoned, maybe this is somebody house, but the sun is going down soon
Go back and respect the owner
What are you doing here?, it is going dark and its dangerous outside, come to my cabin for a night?
Okay do what you wish but i must warn you that don\'t go around when there is no sun, see you around
“ I’m going to go outside to check the rabbit trap, there is some hot soup on the stove feel free to eat it, i’ll be going now”
YOU ARE POISONED\nThe soup has been contaminated by poison you should have seen it coming
As you check the cabins room, you stumble to a paper that says“%1$s! is the next prey”. wait that\'s my name i need to escape from this cabin
YOU ARE CAPTURED\nThe hunter captured you infront of the door and you are going to be his next meal
YOU ARE ALIVE\nYou successfully escaped from the hunter and immediately exit the forest
As you continue walking, you see a note hanging onto the tree, what will you do?
You take the note, it says “ DO NOT TRUST THE VOICE STAY INSIDE %1$s!“ , it rattle you a little bit, you are not that far enough to go back before the sunset
Cancel your hiking and go back to home
YOU ARE ALIVE\nit seems that the mountain is occupied by skin walker
The sun is down, rain start pouring, freezing cold, if you don’t find a shelter it will be a problem
Keep walking because you are strong
You stuck in your tent and it will take long for the rain to ease up, you are bored needing to do something to burn time, what wil you do?
YOU ARE DEAD\nCause of death : Hypothermia\nyou failed to find a shelter on time
The rain has stop, you notice that your hungry, you need to build outside stove that require some woods, what will you do?
The rain has stop, you notice that your hungry, you need to build outside stove that require some woods, what will you do?
The woods nearby is still wet so you have to selectively choose the woods, it is dark but fortunately your phone have a flashlight so it is not a problem
As you collecting the dry woods, you hear someone screaming “HELP ME SOMEBODY!”, it seems that someone need help
Ignore and go back to tent
The woods nearby is still wet so you have to selectively choose dry woods, it is dark and unfortunately your phone died, if you proceed further it will be danger
YOU ARE TRAPPED\nYou can’t see the trap laying around on the ground and you accidentally step to it
You wake up in the middle of the night, you hear someone yelling outside, “ HELP ME SOMEBODY!” , it seems that someone need help
YOU ARE DEAD\nthe skinwalker fools you into believing somebody need help and you re its next prey
YOU ARE ALIVE\nit appears that the one screaming is a creature that mimic it last meals
